param.default:
Joomla/FLEXIcontent native Item Translations (Translate items fully)
with associations of item translations via FLEXIcontent or via J3.0 article associations

Display custom fields
do not add fields that will break feeds display

param.name: feed_extra_fields
param.label:
Extra fields
comma separated list of field names
param.description: Fields that requires extra CSS/JS will not work properly, fields that might be suitable are fields like e.g. date,text,select,etc. Enter a comma separated list of field names

param.name: mu_ra_timeframe_names
param.default: FLEXI_24H_RA , FLEXI_2D_RA , FLEXI_7D_RA , FLEXI_1M_RA , FLEXI_3M_RA , FLEXI_1Y_RA , FLEXI_3Y_RA
param.label: FLEXI_MU_RADDED_TIMEFRAME_NAMES

param.name: mu_ru_timeframe_names
param.default: FLEXI_24H_RU , FLEXI_2D_RU , FLEXI_7D_RU , FLEXI_1M_RU , FLEXI_3M_RU , FLEXI_1Y_RU , FLEXI_3Y_RU
param.label: FLEXI_MU_RUPDATED_TIMEFRAME_NAMES

param.name: form_tabs_above
param.default: title, alias, type, state, disable_comments, notify_subscribers
param.label: FLEXI_ABOVE_TABS

param.name: import_lang
param.label: FLEXI_LANGUAGE
param.description: Enter * OR en-GB or fr-FR or de-DE ...
